author: Trott
message:
doc: edit text for DEP0101

Make the text slightly more concise. Fix awkward verb tense.

files.patch: @@ -925,7 +925,7 @@ This was never a documented feature. Type: End-of-Life -The `--with-lttng` compile time option is removed. +The `--with-lttng` compile-time option has been removed. ### DEP0102: Using `noAssert` in Buffer#(read|write) operations.
